name: Arc'teryx Laina Cardigan - Women's
description:
A simple cardigan that benefits from technical materials. It offers the look of wool, with the warmth and lightness of fleece. Add it to watch the sunset, or for protextion from aggressive office AC.Arc’teryx Alpenex™ Light, lightweight and breathable mesh-backed fleece.Laminated details and precise merrow stiched seams.2 hand pockets.Relaxed fit.

        Sustainability
